name: Jack VS The Uberwaffe
description:
You Play As Jack!

Jack has been annoyed by some weird noises outside and now he needs to find out who or what is making it. Along the way he fights off all* of the 4th Reich and an evil machine dubb'd only as the UberWaffe.

Will you succeed? Or will you fall under the hands of the Baddies(tm pending)?

Contains 4 Cutscenes, 6 Levels, 3 Shootout segments and a bunch of secrets :)

*lies btw

This is all satire if you don't get it. No harm or offense is meant by this game. Don't reccoment playing it with a critical eye. Also expect Slav Jank :) 

Music - Nevada Baxo

Voices - Nevada Baxo

Coding - Nevada Baxo

Artwork - Nevada Baxo

And Finally... shitty design - Nevada Baxo

If you liked this game then consider supporting me on Ko-Fi. I would apreciate it very much :)
